alert.note: Alert for Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 23 at 3:04AM MST until January 23 at 11:00AM MST by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 5 AM MST UNTIL 11 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Northeast to east winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 45 mph near canyons from Box Elder Canyon to Millcreek Canyon, 25 to 35 mph with gusts to 55 mph for typically prone areas in eastern Davis and eastern Weber Counties from Ogden to Bountiful. * WHERE...Eastern Box Elder County, Northern Wasatch Front and Salt Lake Valley. * WHEN...From 5 AM MST until 11 AM MST this morning. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects including decorations, garbage cans and lawn furniture. A few power outages are possible.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Box Elder County; Northern Wasatch Front; Salt Lake Valley
